m2mimud.communications
Interface GameDiscoveryListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameChooser
public interface GameDiscoveryListener

This interface is for objects which wait and listen for changes in the status of games. It as functions which are used to inform when games have been added or removed from the overall network.

Method Summary
 void newSessionAdded(SessionAd theSession)
          Notifies the listener that a new game session has been added to the world.
 void sessionCountChanged(Game handle, int newCount)
          Notifies the listener that the number in a session has updated
 void sessionLeft(Game sessionName)
          Notifies the listener a session has been removed.
 void sessionStateChanged(Game handle, GameState newState)
          Notifes that the session's state has changed.
 

Method Detail

Parameters:

void sessionLeft(Game sessionName)
Notifies the listener a session has been removed.

Parameters:

                         int newCount)
Notifies the listener that the number in a session has updated

newCount - The updated number of members

sessionStateChanged

void sessionStateChanged(Game handle,
                         GameState newState)
Notifes that the session's state has changed.

Parameters:
